Table: **Single Cell Databases**

|------------------	|-------------------------------------------------------------	|------------------------------------	|
| descartes        	| Single cell atlas                                           	| https://descartes.brotmanbaty.org/ 	|

| CancerSEA        	| Functional states of cancer cells at single-cell resolution 	|                                    	|
| Human Cell Atlas 	| Reference maps of all human cells                           	| https://www.humancellatlas.org/    	|
| Mouse Cell Atlas 	| Reference maps of mouse cells                               	| http://bis.zju.edu.cn/MCA/         	|
